package.description:
This package contains meshes and xacro-based URDF files for the Schunk WSG50-110 parallel gripper.
At the moment, this URDF is for kinematic purposes only, and does not contain any dynamics, inertial, control, or simulation properties. Pull requests with such additions, are welcome!
The gripper model has one prismatic joint for each finger: - thumb_joint: the finger on the side with the chamfered edge - index_joint: the finger on the side without the chamfered edge
package.author: Jonathan Bohren
